iphone wallet case christmas ideas

I am a bit of an obsessive-compulsive when it comes to online ordering, and ever since my Hex "The Hundreds" case starting damaging my screen, I am looking again for the ultimate iphone case. Here is a list of the best places I have found so far in no particular order, plus a surprise at the end.

Portel seems to be making a big splash these days. http://www.etsy.com/shop/portel?ref=seller_info

Hard Graft feels modern and very industrial. http://www.hardgraft.com/products/phonefoldwallet-allgrey

Kangarew - they make cases out of bamboo. http://www.kangarew.com/iphone-4s

Byrd and Belle - just gorgeous with an artsy feel. http://byrdandbelle.bigcartel.com/category/iphone-ipod

Boston and London - also very artsy and simple. http://bostonandlondon.storenvy.com/products/136227-iphone-wallet-felt-leather-fold-wallet-grey-caramel

Eboy - an interesting take on a non-folding case. http://shopca.eboy.com/products/nubuk-iphone-wallet-blue#

Landmarks and Lions - very clean with bold colors. http://www.landmarksandlions.com/

Pack and Smooch - people seem to love these cases. http://www.etsy.com/shop/packandsmooch

Nomad - hand-made leather cases. http://www.etsy.com/shop/NomadUnlimited

Ottocase - a huge selection. http://www.ottocase.com/iphone-4-cases/

Waterfield designs is one of my favorites (I have their MacBook Air case called 'Racer-X' and it kicks ass) http://www.sfbags.com/products/iphone-cases/iphone-cases.php

Sena Cases - also a large selection. http://www.senacases.com/apple/iphone-4s-cases/

The Twelve South book-book is all the rage but has no camera peek hole. http://twelvesouth.com/products/bookbook_iphone/

IErnest - maybe my favorite. http://www.iernest.com/c-1152729/for-iphone-4-4s/

Piel Frama - slightly weird Spanish design. Perfect for Lady Gaga. http://www.pielframa.com/indexeng.htm

Koyono - if I wanted another snap case I would buy it here. http://www.koyono.com/iPhone-4-Cases-s/366.htm

Trexta - interesting selection that feels slight gimmicky but the rotating case is cool. http://www.trexta.com/Default.aspx?pageID=17&CatID=38

Finally, the most expensive case (by Stuart Hughes) clocks in at about $100k. not on my list. :) http://www.affluentpageluxuryindex.com/news-and-noteworthy/64995-iphone-wallet-worlds-most-expensive/



By Krister Axel on 11/21 2011 at 23_47 in Random
